title: All My Circuits
description: The saga of Calculon, his love Monique, and his evil half brother Boxy Robot. Betrayal, plane crashes, inoperable cancer, multiple personalities, and so much amnesia!
quote: Let me get this straight. Does anyone here not have amnesia?
altHero: Monique is nervous as Calculon raises a handgun to protect her
alt1: Monique and Calculon romantically hold hands in a pergola
alt2: Monique and Calculon look shocked while at the altar to be married
alt3: Monique is caught in bed with Boxy Robot
